presented in the income statement of the undertaking’s financial statements in accordance with
the applicable legislation and/or accounting standards, i.e. IAS 1 paragraph 82 (a)2 – if IFRS
Standards are applied – or generally accepted national accounting principles (national GAAP).
See also Question ID 482 – Breakdown of total revenue – financial institutions.
Supporting material
Delegated Act (EU) 2021/2178 supplementing Regulation (EU) 2020/852 specifying the content
